*Mantella sits on the ground being very bored not seeing any bots to slag.
She yarns holds her Commlink to her mouth* Mantella: Shredder? What have you
been doing all this time? What's been up over ther? *Mantella says to
Shredder through her Commlink*
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 1:20 AM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Shredder::
>
> Shredder runs through the forest, Ramulus chasing after him. The
ex-predacon
> had retreated when his scanners picked up two Maximals aproaching. He
growls.
> The ram chasing him was pretty experienced, he had to give him that.
>
> Several minutes later, Striker seemed to have lost the Maximal chasing
him.
> He slows down slightly, heading for Magmatron's base.
